lines.text: [As football players about to be flattened by an opposing team]
NOW what are we supposed to do?
Call out the Marines, I think!
Well, how about surrendering and going over to THEIR side?!
Did you hear that?! Dr. Bela's gonna turn Geese into a kangaroo!
Yeah! He's not gonna fix Geese's wrist, he's gonna cook Geese's goose!
[Curly is waiting for Geese's wrist to be fixed.]
Hey, Curly, how's Geese? Is he going to survive?
Well, what room is he in?
Curly, you are a real bundle of information!
